W) Pollen must be transferred between plants by insects X) Pollen travels through the style and directly fertilizes the ovule Y) Either before or after arriving on the stigma, each pollen grain undergoes a mitotic cell division producing two sperm Z) Pollen is a gamete
answer:
Y) EITHER BEFORE OR AFTER ARRIVING ON THE STIGMA, EACH POLLEN
GRAIN UNDERGOES A MITOTIC CELL DIVISION PRODUCING TWO SPERM
